rukus.text: 2|8|Ara [1] manusera madhye emana loka'o rayeche yara bale, ‘amara allah‌ o sesa dibase imana enechi’, athaca tara mumina naya.
2|9|Allah‌ ebam muminaderake tara pratarita kare. Bastutah tara nijederake'i nijera pratarita karache, athaca tara ta bujhe na [1].
2|10|Tadera antarasamuhe rayeche byadhi. Atahpara allah‌ tadera byadhi ara'o bariye diyechena [1]. Ara tadera jan'ya rayeche kastadayaka sasti, karana tara mithyabadi [2].
2|11|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘tomara yamine phasada srsti karo na’[1], tara bale, ‘amara to kebala sansodhanakari’ [2].
2|12|Sabadhana! Era'i phasada srstikari, kintu tara ta bujhe na [1].

2|13|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘tomara imana ana yemana lokera imana eneche’[1], tara bale, ‘nirbodha lokera yerupa imana eneche amara'o ki serupa imana anabo[2]?’ Sabadhana! Niscaya era nirbodha, kintu tara ta jane na.

2|14|Ara yakhana tara muminadera sathe saksata kare, takhana bale, ‘amara imana enechi‘[1], ara yakhana tara ekante tadera sayatanadera [2] sathe ekatrita haya, takhana bale, ‘niscaya amara tomadera sathe achi. Amara to kebala upahasakari.’
2|15|Allah‌ tadera sathe upahasa karena [1], ebam taderake tadera abadhyatara madhye bibhrantera mata ghure berabara abakasa dena.
2|16|Era'i tara, yara hedayatera binimaye bhrastata kineche [1]. Kaje'i tadera byabasa labhajanaka hayani. Ara tara hedayataprapta'o naya.

2|17|Tadera upama [1], ai byaktira n'yaya, ye aguna jbalalo; tarapara yakhana aguna tara caradika alokita karala, allah‌ takhana tadera alo niye gelena ebam taderake ghora andakare phele dilena, yate tara kichu'i dekhate paya na.
2|18|Tara badhira, boba, andha, kaje'i tara phire asabe na [1].

2|19|Kimba akasa hate musaladhare brstira n'yaya, yate rayeche ghora andhakara, bajradhbani [1] o bidyutcamaka. Bajradhbanite mrtyubhaye tara tadera kane angula deya. Ara allah‌ kapheraderake paribestana kare rayechena [2].

2|20|Bidyut camake tadera drstisakti kere neyara upakrama haya [1]. Yakhana'i bidyutaloka tadera samane udbhasita haya takhana'i tara patha cale ebam yakhana andhakare dheke yaya takhana tara tham‌ke damraya [2]. Allah‌ icche karale tadera srabana o drstisakti harana karate parena. Niscaya allah‌ sabakichura upara ksamatabana [3].
